TestDescription.name: Apache 2.x version equal to 2.0.51

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break]An access control bypass vulnerability has been found in this version of Apache. You should upgrade to the latest version of Apache. [break][break][navy]Affected Apache versions (2.0.51).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Impact: A remote attacker may bypass access controls and gain unauthorized access to restricted resources.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache 2.x to the latest version.
